app.updateReady: Update downloaded – it will install when you close the app.
app.updateRequiredMessage: Install version {{version}} to log in. Download the installer or portable from the link below, install, and restart the app.

ads.title: Ads
ads.statsPlaceholder: Ad and banner statistics will be available in the future.

invoices.title: Invoices
invoices.hint: List of issued invoices (orders with invoice number).
invoices.batchExportDone: Saved {{count}} invoice(s) to the chosen folder.
invoices.removeSelectedConfirm: Remove invoice data from {{count}} selected invoice(s)? Orders will remain but without invoice number and date.

subcontracts.title: Subcontracts
subcontracts.hint: Subcontracts delegated to contractors. Here you can generate Order Confirmation (PO) as PDF.
subcontracts.name: Subcontract name

orderBook.title: Order Books
orderBook.paymentDueHint: Payment due is set from invoice date + client default payment term.
orderBook.issueInvoiceWfirmaHint: The invoice will be created in wFirma via API.
orderBook.issueInvoiceWfirmaTemplateHint: Besides notes selected here, notes from your wFirma template may also appear on the invoice.
orderBook.wfirmaAccountRequired: Select a wFirma bank account before issuing the invoice.
orderBook.repertoriumReturnDate: Date of return of document with translation
orderBook.repertoriumDocDescriptionHint: MS requirement: name, date and reference of document, language, issuing authority, notes on type, form and condition
orderBook.repertoriumDocDescriptionPlaceholder: E.g.: Birth certificate of 12.01.2020, English, Warsaw Civil Registry, original, good condition
orderBook.repertoriumClientNameAddress: Designation of ordering party or party commissioning the designated translation
orderBook.repertoriumDocumentAuthor: Person or institution that drew up the document
orderBook.repertoriumSourceLang: Language in which the document was drawn up
orderBook.repertoriumDocumentFormRemarks: Remarks on type, content, form and condition of document
orderBook.oralRateHint: Own or from settings if set
orderBook.noDefaultRateForPairAndUnit: No default rate for selected pair and unit {{unitName}}
orderBook.noDefaultRateForArgumentAndUnit: No default rate for selected argument and unit {{unitName}}
orderBook.noDefaultRateForCurrencyAndUnit: No default rate for currency {{currency}} and selected argument/unit {{unitName}}
orderBook.noDefaultRateSetInSettingsHint: To use this currency, add a default rate for this currency and selected argument in Settings (Default rates).
orderBook.oralGrossFromVat: Calculated automatically (net + VAT) when client charges VAT
orderBook.sameClientRequired: All selected orders must be for the same client.
orderBook.sameCurrencyRequired: Only orders in the same currency can be on one invoice.

orders.title: Orders
orders.removeInvoiceConfirm: Remove invoice data from this order? The order will be back to "To be issued".
orders.removeInvoiceWfirmaHint: Only the invoice preview is removed in the app. To delete the invoice in wFirma as well, do it in the wFirma.pl panel.
orders.name: Order name

clients.title: Clients
clients.name: Name
clients.vatEuNipPrefixHint: For EU VAT client enter the number with country prefix (e.g. DE123456789).
clients.deleteConfirm: Delete this client? Linked orders will remain but without client.
clients.fetchByNipHint: Polish NIP (10 digits). Fills name and address from the official VAT register. Only finds VAT-registered entities.
clients.fetchByNipFailureHint: If fetching from the databases fails, fill in the data manually.
clients.fetchByNipManualEntry: Could not fetch from VAT or GUS register. Please enter data manually.
clients.defaultRatesPerUnitHint: Used to prefill rate when creating an order for this client.

contractors.title: Contractors
contractors.name: Name
contractors.ratesPerUnit: Rates per unit and language direction
contractors.ratesPerUnitHint: Used to prefill rate when adding a subcontract. Rate can depend on language direction (language pair).
contractors.fetchByNipHint: Polish NIP (10 digits). Fills name and address from VAT or GUS register.
contractors.fetchByNipFailureHint: If fetching from the databases fails, fill in the data manually.
contractors.fetchByNipManualEntry: Could not fetch from VAT or GUS register. Please enter data manually.

settings.title: Settings
settings.languagesHint: Add language codes (e.g. EN, PL). Then create pairs below.
settings.languagePairsHint: Section intended mainly for translators. Create pairs from the languages above (e.g. EN > PL).
settings.pairBidirectional: Bidirectional (e.g. EN<>PL, e.g. for liaison interpreting)
settings.unitCategoriesHint: Categories group units (e.g. written, oral). For each category assign a base unit.
settings.unitCategoriesBaseUnitHint: Auxiliary units are converted to the base unit for statistics purposes.
settings.deleteCategoryConfirm: Delete this category? Units will be unassigned from it.
settings.unitsHint: Assign each unit to a category. For each category choose a base unit; others use conversion to the base.
settings.unitsBaseForStatsHint: Auxiliary units are converted to the base unit for statistics purposes.
settings.predefinedSettingsHint: Predefined settings apply only to services, units and their categories. This option does not affect other settings.
settings.restorePredefinedConfirm: Are you sure you want to restore predefined settings for the current language? Current units, unit categories and services will be replaced.
settings.restorePredefinedConfirmMessage: Current units, categories and services will be replaced with predefined settings. Enter your account password to confirm.
settings.clearPredefinedConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete all units, unit categories and services? This cannot be undone. Enter your account password to confirm.
settings.clearPredefinedErrorOrdersExist: There are already orders in the order book. To restore or clear predefined settings (units, categories, services), delete all orders first.
settings.unitAssignCategoryHint: Assign the unit to at least 1 category. Hold CTRL to deselect.
settings.multiplierToBaseHint: How many base units are contained in this unit
settings.noUnits: No units (defaults: words, pages, characters with spaces).
settings.sellerIsVatPayerWfirmaHint: With wFirma integration, VAT payer status must also be set in the wFirma.pl panel (Your company → Tax details).
settings.taxpayerCountryCodeHint: Used to determine client segment (domestic / EU / world) for VAT.
settings.vatCodeDefinitionsHint: Codes shown on invoice (e.g. NP, ZW). Enter a label for each code; the app and invoice use the label for the selected language.
settings.vatSegmentCompanyDomesticHint: Select the VAT rate applied to a client that is a company and is from the same country as the taxpayer.
settings.vatSegmentCompanyEuHint: Select the VAT rate applied to a client that is a company and is from the EU.
settings.vatSegmentCompanyWorldHint: Select the VAT rate applied to a client that is a company but is not from the taxpayer's country or the EU.
settings.vatSegmentPersonDomesticHint: Select the VAT rate applied to a client who is an individual and is from the same country as the taxpayer.
settings.vatSegmentPersonEuHint: Select the VAT rate applied to a client who is an individual and is from the EU.
settings.vatSegmentPersonWorldHint: Select the VAT rate applied to a client who is an individual but is not from the taxpayer's country or the EU.
settings.vatPerServiceHint: For each service set VAT rate or code by client segment. Optional override per country.
settings.currenciesHint: Currencies available for rates in orders (e.g. PLN, EUR, CHF). Add a currency code and click "Add currency".
settings.dataFolderRestartRequired: Path saved. Restart the application to use it.
settings.dataFolderError_NOT_SUPPORTED: Changing the data folder is only supported on Windows.
settings.dataFolderError_NOT_A_DIRECTORY: The path is not a directory.
settings.servicesHint: Configuration of names of services provided. Such a name can later be included in the order and in the invoice description.
settings.invoiceLogoHint: PNG/JPG image, shown in the top right corner of the invoice (max ~110x55px).
settings.invoiceNotesPlaceholder: E.g. VAT exemption info, payment terms, etc.
settings.invoiceNotesHint: Content shown below the table on invoice. Can be edited when issuing.
settings.invoiceNotesListHint: Add several templates. When issuing an invoice you will choose which notes to include.
settings.wfirmaAccessKeyPlaceholder: Paste Access key from wFirma account
settings.wfirmaSecretKeyPlaceholder: Paste Secret key (shown only once when creating)
settings.wfirmaKeysHint: In wFirma: Settings → Security → Applications → API Keys. Access key and Secret key are required.
settings.wfirmaAppKeyHint: Application key – generated together with Access/Secret key in wFirma.
settings.wfirmaCompanyIdHint: Required only when you have multiple companies in wFirma.
settings.wfirmaCompanyAccountHint: Select the bank account to use when issuing invoices via API.
settings.wfirmaAccountsEmpty: No accounts available or no permissions to read them.
settings.wfirmaAccountsNeedKeys: Enter Access key and Secret key first.
settings.invoiceIssueWfirmaError: Failed to issue invoice in wFirma:
settings.invoiceIssueWfirmaVatPayerHint:
This message comes from wFirma – in the wFirma.pl panel (Your company / Tax details) set your status as „VAT payer” to allow issuing VAT invoices.

If you are not a VAT payer, change the setting in Settings → Your data.
settings.defaultColumnsHint: Simplified view columns - you can hide them in this book or restore them.
settings.addedCustomColumns: Added custom columns (hide from view or delete permanently)
settings.deleteColumnConfirm: Delete this custom column? Values saved in orders will be removed.
settings.orderBooksHint: Add or remove books. View type (simplified / register / custom) is set per book. Custom view is based on simplified and lets you add custom columns.
settings.deleteBookConfirm: Delete this book? Orders in it will be moved to the first book.
settings.defaultRatesHint: Net rates used as hints when adding orders. Per unit: a default rate and optional rates by argument (e.g. language pair, specialization, service, custom column). Currency is stored.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.paymentsHint: Number of orders by invoice status (not invoice count).
analytics.reportsHint: Group by determines the chart bars; filters narrow the data (e.g. group by year, then filter by specialization or language pair).
analytics.earningsReportHint: Pivot table and chart: choose row grouping, value column (net/VAT/gross), aggregation (sum/average/max), and filters (like in Excel).

auth.registerHint: Create the first local account for this app.
auth.goToLogin: Already have an account? Sign in
auth.verificationEmailSent: Check your email and click the link to activate your account.
auth.resendVerificationSent: Verification link has been sent to your email.
auth.forgotPasswordSent: If an account with this email exists, you will receive an email with a link to set a new password.
auth.error_EMAIL_NOT_VERIFIED: Account is not active yet. Confirm your email by clicking the link sent to your inbox.
auth.error_INVALID_INPUT: Invalid data. Password must have at least 6 characters.
auth.error_EMAIL_TAKEN: This email is already in use.
auth.error_SERVER_ERROR: Server error. Please try again later.
auth.error_ORG_ACCESS_DENIED: This account has no access to selected organization.
auth.error_ACCOUNT_DISABLED: This account has been disabled. Contact the administrator.
auth.error_LICENSE_TOKEN_INVALID: Server returned an invalid license. Login not possible.
auth.error_DB_ORGANIZATION_MISMATCH: This database belongs to another organization or user. You will be logged out.
auth.error_DB_NOT_LINKED: This database is not linked to any account. Restart the app and in the dialog choose "Link to current account".
auth.error_NOT_FOUND: Auth server is not responding correctly. Make sure the server is running (npm run server) and the URL is correct.
auth.error_USER_NOT_FOUND: No user found with this email address.
auth.error_EMAIL_SEND_FAILED: Failed to send email. Check SMTP configuration on the server.
auth.licenseWarningBanner: Connect to the internet to refresh your license and avoid losing access.

notifications.title: Server announcements
notifications.subtitle: Here you will see updates, announcements and product news.
notifications.welcomeBody: Thank you for using the app. This popup will later display server messages such as updates, upcoming features and important announcements.
notifications.historyHint: Dismissed messages are not shown as popup again, but remain available here.

common.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this?

warnings.title: Configuration check list
warnings.taxpayerCountryMissing: Taxpayer country is not set. VAT may be calculated incorrectly. Set it in Settings -> Taxpayer data.
warnings.check1: Set your data (Settings -> Your data) - first and last name OR company name, street, city, country. Required for invoices and order confirmations.
warnings.check2: Add at least one order book.
warnings.check3: Add at least one currency (Settings -> Currencies).
warnings.check4: Add at least one service type (Settings -> Services).
warnings.check5a: Add at least one unit category.
warnings.check6: Select default units for register (register book -> book settings).
warnings.check7: You have no default rates - set them (Settings -> Default rates) so they suggest in orders.
warnings.check8: Set VAT rates for each service (Settings -> Services, VAT per service).
warnings.sellerVatPayerNotSet: With wFirma integration, indicate whether you are a VAT payer (Settings → Entity details).
warnings.wfirmaKeysMissing: For wFirma integration, provide API keys (Access key and Secret key). In wFirma: Settings -> Security -> Applications -> API Keys.
